displayProperties.description: "OK, so, Albios's memorial service was on Io. Sacred to Warlocks, blah blah blah. Don't get me wrong, I liked Al—but the service ran a bit long. Ended up betting Banshee I could make a few hairy jumps high up on the Mesa. Broke both my legs, but I did it. I forget what Banshee gave me, but I know I left it in a cache up there somewhere.” —Cayde-6
displayProperties.name: Io Treasure Map
